text: kah do, "ai logon! yadi tum mere dharm ke vishay mein kisee sandeh mein ho to main to unakee bandagee nahin karata jinakee tum allaah se hatakar bandagee karate ho, balki main us allaah kee bandagee karata hoon jo tumhen mrtyu deta hai. aur mujhe aadesh hai ki main eemaanavaalon mein se hooon
